subject: Television
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Even after being blown out in Game 5, the Oklahoma City Thunder proved emphatically that their small-market status did not hurt viewership. Game 5 was the most viewed game on TV of the series
snippet: Even after being blown out in Game 5, the Oklahoma City Thunder proved emphatically that their small-market status did not hurt viewership. Game 5 was the most viewed game on TV of the series
